name: Xmas Demo 2019
description:
Go head-to-head in this polyomino shape sorting game that's loosely based on mathematical games that have appeared in many different guises since the late 1930s.

Collect the glowing cubes to build up your special powers - and release them on your unsuspecting opponent!

Complete horizontal lines to keep your playing area as clear as possible, as when you reach the top its game over!

Be warned - this can be a very fast-paced, quick game.

This is a VERY EARLY pre-Alpha Demo, released just in time for Christmas 2019.

There will be lots of bugs, and lots of unfinished code. The idea of releasing early is just to get a general feel for its reception before putting too many hours into it...

Oh, btw, I've never made or released a game before! So "constructive criticism" welcome.

Music is all public domain (as far as I can tell) and was found on www.pumpyouup.com
